Growing Up NYC
  • Patterns

Overlay

The overlay object is a container that floats above existing patterns when made visible. This object is dependent on the Toggle Utility from the NYCO Patterns Framework.

Overlay content.

<a data-js="toggle-search" href="#search" onclick="return false;"><svg class="icon--small" role="img">
    <title>Search</title>
    <use xlink:href="#icon-search"></use>
  </svg></a>
<div aria-hidden="true" class="o-overlay hidden p-4" id="search">
  <p>Overlay content.</p>
</div>
